snippet.title: Downslope - OUT NOW
snippet.description:
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/blast-brawl-2-switch/
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2215-CUSA17945_00-BB20000000000002
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/blast-brawl-2/brdmlrh8wfn0
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491090/Downslope/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MindsEyeGames

Downslope is a chill snowboarding game where you explore a mysterious Mountain.

Snowboard your way down the dizzying Descent! Race down complex, tricky courses as you make your way further and further down the Mountain's slopes, trying to make it in time to proceed. Style your snowboarder from a vast wardrobe of options, creating the perfect look. Meet the ghosts of those who have braved its slopes before you. Hear their stories. Help them move on.

And maybe - just maybe - you can reach the End.

Are you fast enough? Are you skilled enough? There's only one way to find out.
